Applesauce

Songwriting, Record, Mix, Master

Applesauce is a funk/hybrid band with three records under their belt. They've supported many island artists over the years, and even though no longer active, they still have a strong cult following.

Their first two records, the Applesauce EP and the self-titled album were produced by Paul Cline. Additional production by Jesse Cudworth and Bonnie Marshall Bojorquez.

D-Dub

Sauce EP
